EmailTemplate.name: External Newsletter.2017-12-08
EmailTemplate.subject: SpringOne Platform 2017 and Announcing The Expansion of Pivotal Cloud Foundry
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
december 08, 2017 <[[https://content.pivotal.io/announcements/pivotal-unveils-expansion-of-pivotal-cloud-foundry-and-announces-serverless-computing-product?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Announcing The Expansion of Pivotal Cloud Foundry The next era of Pivotal Cloud Foundry has arrived. Learn More <[[https://content.pivotal.io/announcements/pivotal-unveils-expansion-of-pivotal-cloud-foundry-and-announces-serverless-computing-product?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/springone-platform-2017/pivotal-cloud-foundry-2-0-rob-mee-onsi-fakhouri?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> What's New for Pivotal Cloud Foundry 2.0 Onsi Fakhouri gives an overview of new releases and what's to come for Pivotal Cloud Foundry at SpringOne Platform 2017. Watch Now <[[https://content.pivotal.io/springone-platform-2017/pivotal-cloud-foundry-2-0-rob-mee-onsi-fakhouri?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://builttoadapt.io/from-back-office-to-business-force-5a7c0ceff2b6?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> From Back-Office to Business Force Hear from Comcast's Greg Otto at Built to Adapt at SpringOne Platform on how they focused on resiliency and time-to-market, and how the company brought tools that were were at the nexus of important customer transactions over to a cycle of continuous integration and delivery. The Journey to 20,000 deployments <[[https://builttoadapt.io/from-back-office-to-business-force-5a7c0ceff2b6?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://builttoadapt.io/that-moment/home?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://builttoadapt.io/the-sun-doesnt-set-on-west-corp-283fbeedfcdc?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> The Sun Doesn’t Set on West Corp. Jeff and Ciara sit down with West Corp.’s Thomas Squeo, Gautham Pallapa, and Don Fossgreen, to talk automation, embracing the API marketplace, sunsetting apps and replatforming others. How West Corp. is Transforming Itself <[[https://builttoadapt.io/the-sun-doesnt-set-on-west-corp-283fbeedfcdc?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/springone-platform-2017/lieutenant-colonel-enrique-oti?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Lieutenant Colonel Enrique Oti at SpringOne Platform 2017 Lieutenant Colonel Enrique Oti talks DIUx and their transformation journey at SpringOne Platform 2017. Check it Out <[[https://content.pivotal.io/springone-platform-2017/lieutenant-colonel-enrique-oti?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/springone-platform-2017/cornelia-davis-6?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Lightning Talks on Distributed Systems at SpringOne Platform 2017 Cornelia Davis, Meaghan Kjelland, Therese Stowell, Erin Schnabel, and Mathangi Venkatesan present on distributed systems at SpringOne Platform 2017. When There Are Nine <[[https://content.pivotal.io/springone-platform-2017/cornelia-davis-6?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/a-look-to-the-future-day-4-at-springone-platform-2017]]> A Look to the Future: Day 4 at SpringOne Platform 2017 Check out the highlights from the last day of SpringOne Platform 2017. Read Now <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/a-look-to-the-future-day-4-at-springone-platform-2017]]> Upcoming Events 12/11-12/14 Core Spring Training Session, Sydney <[[https://academy.pivotal.io/confirm-course?courseid=EDU-1094?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]>
12/12-12/15 Enterprise Spring Training Session, Online <[[https://academy.pivotal.io/confirm-course?courseid=EDU-1095]]>
12/12 Internal Building Blocks - Aggregates, Entities, Value Objects, ... Part Three, Webinar <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/dec-12-internal-building-blocks-aggregates-entities-value-objects-part-three-webinar?utm_source=social&utm_medium=link&utm_campaign=ddd-part two-three--plod-q417]]>
12/13 Building a Big Data Fabric with a Next Generation Data Platform, Webinar <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/dec-13-building-a-big-data-fabric-with-a-next-generation-data-platform-webinar?utm_source=social&utm_medium=link&utm_campaign=big-data-fabric-q417]]>
